Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
< PLDatabase >Protocol for interacting with an SQL database
< PLDatabaseConnectionProvider >A protocol for opening new or existing PLDatabase connections, and returning those connections for re-use upon completion
< PLDatabaseMigrationDelegate >The PLDatabaseMigrationDelegate is responsible for applying any migration necessary to update a database to the latest schema/data required by an application
PLDatabaseMigrationManagerThe PLDatabaseMigrationManager implements transactional, versioned migration/initialization of database schema and data
< PLDatabaseMigrationTransactionManager >Manages the database migration transactions and locking to ensure atomic testing of the database version and application of any migrations
< PLDatabaseMigrationVersionManager >Manages the database migration version
< PLPreparedStatement >An object that represents a pre-compiled statement, and any parameters bound to that statement
< PLResultSet >Represents a set of results returned by an SQL query
PLSqliteConnectionProviderProvides new PLSqliteDatabase connections as per the PLDatabaseConnectionProvider protocol
PLSqliteDatabaseAn SQLite PLDatabase driver
PLSqliteMigrationVersionManagerImplements database schema versioning using SQLite's per-database user_version field (see http://www.sqlite.org/pragma.html#version)
